MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:55am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25am on 6th November
